content:
Hey guys,
I am looking for a conversionscript which translate instances in UKF (Ultrakurzformat ; "ultrashortformat") in FHIR-Bundles. This is possibly a rather german question ;). Thanks for your help! Niklas
you could try the #german (d-a-ch) stream
That should have been developed in the MedicationPlus project as an XSLT.
